pullrequest.title: Model submission for X5 (Teambase) sensor configuration 1 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw:
Due to time constraints, this configuration will not be incorporated before the code freeze, but a basestation capability will be considered for the future. Until then, you are welcome to use a low-cost robot configuration as your basestation. Please note the battery will not drain unless you move the robot. 

Would you like to keep this PR open for consideration after Urban Circuit?
content.html:
Due to time constraints, this configuration will not be incorporated before the code freeze, but a basestation capability will be considered for the future. Until then, you are welcome to use a low-cost robot configuration as your basestation. Please note the battery will not drain unless you move the robot.

Would you like to keep this PR open for consideration after Urban Circuit?
